\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3bfbf74becc7da2b2f4533c6b9e41766]%mdk
$\E[X]= (1/|S|)\sum_{s\in S}X(s)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e0ea647cfe1e76b41c13c0da34ea3cc3]%mdk
$Var[X] = \E [ (X-\E[X])^2 ]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={39}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3bef43843dcfb25946b8613924e2a02f]%mdk
$Var[X]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={41}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b89ccb62f143d578bc098eebb9141978]%mdk
$\mu = E[X]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={41}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1fcbaf66c1feee8f50376e044b86b3ba]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={44}
\begin{aligned} 
Var[X] &= E[(X - \mu])^2] \\
&= \left(\frac{1}{|S|}\right) \sum_{s \in S} (X(s) - \mu)^2 \\
&\geq 0 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={50}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8fc91236434e113ddefa5807ccd5c348]%mdk
$(X(s) - \mu)^2 \geq 0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={50}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0718ed5a3e27d89dc5efb8160425a476]%mdk
$s \in S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={51}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[077c44791eb1d513cc0541f0898cd6e0]%mdk
$(X(s) - \mu)^2 = 0 \iff X(s) = \mu$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={55}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[078c8c94fd558ba0bd3082bd99b2b7cb]%mdk
$Var[X] = \E[X^2] - \E[X]^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={57}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b89ccb62f143d578bc098eebb9141978]%mdk
$\mu = E[X]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={57}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[bb97ef94da410e27bccd50467af84c93]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={60}
\begin{aligned}
Var[X] &= E[(X - \mu)^2] \\
&= E[X^2 - 2X\mu + \mu^2]  \\
&= E[X^2] - 2\mu E[X] + \mu^2 \\
&= E[X^2] - \mu^2 \\
&= E[X^2] - E[X]^2
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={69}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a1058e66f0dd841b499ff2d1eed10e33]%mdk
$E[X] = \mu$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={70}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b89ccb62f143d578bc098eebb9141978]%mdk
$\mu = E[X]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={73}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e568d1cb99f707e3b257e8d0f292e443]%mdk
$\E[X^2] \geq \E[X]^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={75}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[367ca0f98f804962d7f9f3f5bb451ce6]%mdk
$Var[X] = E[X^2] - E[X]^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={76}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b8c9e7ef46ead6405ff66118ddf712df]%mdk
$Var[X] \geq 0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={77}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c4feb9cf8f31580c42b05d59fb28b234]%mdk
$Var[X] \geq 0 \implies E[X^2] - E[X]^2 \geq 0 \implies E[X^2] \geq E[X]^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={80}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={80}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[837583c789cc041cb6fee2675de4550a]%mdk
$\E[X^2] \neq \E[X]^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={82}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={82}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[010ac4b713debffe565e65b74a086839]%mdk
$X(S) = \{1,2\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={82}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[6ad4906d78a34e5b8e6c2bc8553c22fb]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={85}
\begin{aligned}
E[X^2] &= \frac{1}{2}[1^2 + 2^2] = \frac{5}{2}\\
E[X]^2 &= (\frac{1}{2}[1 + 2])^2 = \frac{9}{4}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={90}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[55a6a7ea52d0d448488a75e670428e1e]%mdk
$E[X^2] = E[X]^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={90}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cfcd208495d565ef66e7dff9f98764da]%mdk
$0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={92}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={93}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b62b9c1a6d38dcb32555f53fa998d7f3]%mdk
$\E[ | X - \E[X] | ]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a950ca257a1c51ece387d939d3c1f269]%mdk
$X(S) = \{-1,1,6\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8638254592b7816c817b5fd0cfcbf1bf]%mdk
$E[X] = 2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={95}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[59f64e35b8317a54e95d42669a866231]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={99}
\begin{aligned}
SD[X] &= \sqrt{Var[X]} = \sqrt{E[X^2] - E[X]^2} = \sqrt{\frac{38}{3} - \frac{12}{3}} = 
\sqrt{\frac{26}{3}} = \frac{\sqrt{78}}{3} \\
E[|X -E[X]|] &= \frac{8}{3}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={106}

%mdk-data-line={108}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[44b1afa36f3bf2d2a17eaf3f6eaba13a]%mdk
$X = 0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={108}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[59f03c061be46a8564bc3ba06b56ff23]%mdk
$Y = 0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={109}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={110}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[010ac4b713debffe565e65b74a086839]%mdk
$X(S) = \{1,2\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={110}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={110}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ab33d0f06cfc0f17812a74c9f3fffee7]%mdk
$Y(S) = \{3,4\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={111}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={111}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[74c53bcd3dcb2bb79993b2fec37d362a]%mdk
$XY$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={111}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[883cc38bf0b5b7437a35250a64293c05]%mdk
$XY(S \times S) = \{3,4,6,8\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={111}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[34dbc909645b6b11b561cb4184edf936]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={115}
\begin{aligned}
E[XY] &= \frac{1}{4} (3 + 4 + 6 + 8) = \frac{21}{4} \\
E[X]E[Y] &= \left[\frac{1}{2}(1 + 2) \right] \left[\frac{1}{2} ( 3 + 4) \right] = 
\frac{3}{2}\frac{7}{2} = \frac{21}{4}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={121}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[44e7a3d5b6f36e04a9b6f5c297aeab15]%mdk
$\E[XY] \neq \E[X]\E[Y]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={126}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={129}
E[XY] = E[X^2] \neq E[X]^2 = E[X]E[Y]
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f10bc3c94b77e1d6b9f98106daf335c1]%mdk
$x,y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={134}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[270bb75bebec70871a8111324cd1297e]%mdk
$\Pr[X=x \wedge Y=y]=\Pr[X=x]\Pr[Y=y]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={135}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[18fc1ed2a0cf0ae1509243ff668141cf]%mdk
$\E[XY]=\E[X]\E[Y]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={135}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1fe08fb896fc60fabf10d49d66a8406e]%mdk
$Var[X+Y]=Var[X]+Var[Y]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={137}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[6e3db3a3cc41ece27e8e945b41a4c70e]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={140}
\begin{aligned}
E[XY] &= \sum_{x \in S, y \in S} Pr[X = x \wedge Y = y]xy \\
& = \sum_{x \in S} \sum_{y \in S} (Pr[X = x]x) (Pr[Y= y]y) \\
&= \sum_{x \in S} Pr[X = x]x \sum_{y \in S} Pr[Y = y]y \\
&= E[X]E[Y] 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={148}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[339f6e8d5de7477519da149a67d619b0]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[cdba7e26e8182fc8ff7d9dfe471d64eb]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={164}
E[X_{1,2}] = 0 \cdot Pr[X_{1,2} = 0] + 1 \cdot Pr[X_{1,2} = 1] = Pr[X_{1,1} = 2] = 
Pr[H(1) = H(2)] = \frac{1}{m}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[40a0e43cf17e6d492fb5dc06b52e5b23]%mdk
$Y = \sum_{i < j} X_{i,j}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={170}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b1da181621de9ed577fd6e869ce296ab]%mdk
$\E[ Y ]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={170}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7b8b965ad4bca0e41ab51de7b31363a1]%mdk
$n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={170}

$m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={171}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[839f7920f1db22567ce7bc9da7940e10]%mdk
$m < n^2/1000$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={171}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6f4ccdf0c81e988e574c17911c997863]%mdk
$\E[Y]>1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={172}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c1d9f50f86825a1a2302ec2449c17196]%mdk
$H$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={174}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[acb03634300db3e40ad07150ab48f539]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={177}
E[Y] = E\left[\sum_{i < j} X_{i,j}\right] = \sum_{i < j} E[X_{i,j}] = \frac{n(n-1)}{2m}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={180}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[aa6a293520e3a7a6cf8930f24bf5c1df]%mdk
$i < j \in \{1,\cdots, n\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={180}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8432df5e0148b7dc952c6df3dd9cc0f7]%mdk
${n \choose 2} = \frac{n(n-1)}{2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={180}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[5d270042f4850aeb4fc44dfd400f9791]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={183}
m < n^2/1000 \implies E[Y] > \frac{n^2-n}{2n^2 / 1000} = 500(1 - \frac{1}{n}) > 1   
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={185}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[05497f3e6c7e0776a38426f0b74187f5]%mdk
$m > 1000\cdot n^2 \implies m > 5 n^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={199}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[131cb1d91e2c3a2621fd6c51aae5e43d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={201}
E[Y] = \frac{n^2-n}{2m} < \frac{n^2 - n}{10 n^2} = \frac{1}{10} - \frac{1}{10n} < \frac{1}{10}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\]%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={291}
\frac{\sum_{k=0}^{\lfloor 0.4n \rfloor} {n \choose k}}{2^n} \leq c_1\frac{ {n \choose 0.4n }}{2^n}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={298}
{n \choose 0.4n} \leq c_2\frac{\sqrt{n}}{n}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={300}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[90d23468d32cd498f9fd52729e8f3662]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={302}
\Pr_{x \getsr \zo^n}\left[\sum x_i \geq 0.6n \right] \leq \frac{c_1c_2}{2^{n}\sqrt{n}} = \frac{1}{2^{n + \frac{1}{2} \log n - \log c_1 c_2}} < \frac{1}{2^{n/1000}}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[602a4ceb898421dfd6c36bd1c322c108]%mdk
$K \gets \zo^{n}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={346}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[7009aff97d47cc5c9b424d84fbe8a273]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={350}
\Pr[E_K(m_0) = c] = \Pr[E_K(m_1) = c] 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={353}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac]%mdk
$M$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={353}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0d61f8370cad1d412f80b84d143e1257]%mdk
$C$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={354}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2fb292db54be37453ab787b11c588115]%mdk
$C = c$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={354}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[36e5b77de21275ba24668f3447aac8ab]%mdk
$M = m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={354}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[9367600c741615cacd8ae807a44f6236]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={357}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[M = m \mid C = c] &= \frac{\Pr[C = c \mid M = c] \Pr[M = m]}{\Pr[C = c]} \\
&= \frac{\Pr[C = c \mid M = c] \Pr[M = m]}{\sum_{m' \in \mathcal{M}} \Pr[C = c \mid M = m'] \Pr[M = m']} \\
&= \frac{\Pr[M = m]}{\sum_{m' \in \mathcal{M} \Pr[M = m']}} \\
&= \Pr[M = m]
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[9dd9e7c398cdf5be1f188076b81d414c]%mdk
$\forall m' \in \mathcal{M}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={366}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[4368a0cedf3bdf6d11dcb329534759fb]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={368}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[C = c \mid M = m'] &= \Pr[E_K(M) = c \mid M = m'] \\
&= \Pr[E_K(m') = c] = \Pr[E_K(m) = c] \\
&= \Pr[C = c \mid M = m]
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={374}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3548382d9f1edad8935499a5315ce4e9]%mdk
$M = m'$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={376}

$\Pr[C = c \mid M = m]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92eb5ffee6ae2fec3ad71c777531578f]%mdk
$b$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={479}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[44ef18667e4bf466dc437a9c3ec47d9b]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2}\Pr[Eve(E_k(m_0)) = 1]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={479}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[5f0d683d7b7e5e983f9fae6057fbaf93]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={481}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[Eve(E_k(m_b)) = b] &= \frac{1}{2} (\Pr[Eve(E_k(m_0)) = 0] + \Pr[Eve(E_k(m_0)) = 1]) \\
&+\frac{1}{2}(\Pr[Eve(E_k(m_1)) = 1] - \Pr[Eve(E_k(m_0)) = 1])
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={486}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[240f41919a2f2c65e0d4ffff46184e65]%mdk
$x + y \leq x + |y|$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={487}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ccdc579f0afb6b55acf5ae5daa25eb07]%mdk
$\Pr[Eve(E_k(m_0)) = 0] + \Pr[Eve(E_k(m_0)) = 1] = 1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={487}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[eb69dad50e0cfc63de09e719dcf13d28]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={490}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[Eve(E_k(m_b)) = b] &\leq \frac{1}{2} + \frac{1}{2}|\Pr[Eve(E_k(m_1)) = 1] - \Pr[Eve(E_k(m_0)) = 1]| \\
&\leq \frac{1}{2} + \frac{\epsilon}{2} 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={498}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c150726dc018e82825c0c3617f46a1c9]%mdk
